definition: Ordovician system (geology)/see 奧陶紀|奥陶纪
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: The Cambrian-Ordovician boundary set between D.
sentences.chinese: 寒武系与奥陶系界线位于D。

sentences.english: Tectonic action is the primary factor that controls palaeo-rock-solution development of ordovician carbonate beneath salt.
sentences.chinese: 构造作用是控制盐下奥陶系岩溶发育主要因素。

sentences.english: In north China, the thickness of Ordovician system is larger, the water-abundance is better.
sentences.chinese: 华北地区奥陶系厚度大，富水性强。

sentences.english: The authors suggest that the main material source of bauxite is originated from its underlying Ordovician limestone.
sentences.chinese: 本文认为孝义铝土矿物质来源主要是下伏奥陶系灰岩。

sentences.english: The Ordovician system is characterized by the tidal flat facies with a few shallow sea facies.
sentences.chinese: 奥陶系以发育潮坪相为特征，并有少量浅海沉积。

sentences.english: Ordovician carbonates of Tahe oilfield have been reformed by tectonic movements for many times.
sentences.chinese: 塔河油田奥陶系碳酸盐岩经历了多期构造运动的改造。

sentences.english: Dongshan Coalfield is located in the western part of Niangziguan Spring Area.
sentences.chinese: 东山井田位于娘子关奥陶系岩溶泉域的西部。

sentences.english: The Tahe reservoir Ordovician carbonate rock belongs to the type reservoir that this is special.
sentences.chinese: 塔河油田奥陶系碳酸盐岩属于该特殊类型油藏。

sentences.english: Vertically, oil-gas loss in Ordovician is the biggest, followed by Cambrian.
sentences.chinese: 奥陶系排油气损失最严重，其次为寒武系。

definition: Silurian system (geology)/see 志留紀|志留纪
lower Cambrian series (geological strata from approx 530 million years ago)
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
